channel.title: concourse on Michael Freedman

item.title: Concourse Fly REPL
item.description: have you ever needed to login into a team on concourse and then forgotten you were targeting that team and then done something stupid? I have the solution for you! temp-fly will give you a fly REPL with a temporary configuration - that lasts only as long as the script is running! Batteries not included
